work.name: Toqua
work.summary: Lead machine learning researcher at Toqua, building statistical models to decarbonize shipping using neural networks.

work.name: KU Leuven
work.summary: Researcher on distributed machine learning and signal processing methods for wireless sensor networks within the Biomed-STADIUS group, focusing in biomedical applications.
highlights: Distributed machine learning and signal processing algorithms
Denoising, dimensionality reduction, correlation & component analysis, etc. in adaptive settings for EEG sensors, microphone arrays.
Created a generic framework for these methods including rigorous analyses and theoretical guarantees
Developed a toolbox implementing this framework in Python and MATLAB
Extending the algorithmic framework that I built toward new fields, such as federated learning

work.name: Philips Research
work.summary: Summer internship at the Data Science Department of Philips Research in Eindhoven.

courses: Part of the European Research Council (ERC) project DISPATCH Neuro-Sense”
Thesis: Distributed Spatial Filtering in Wireless Sensor Networks, supervised by Prof. Alexander Bertrand
Courses in machine learning, deep learning, signal processing, optimization & information theory
Thesis: Beyond Euclidean Distance Matrices, supervised by Dr. Adam Scholefield, LCAV group led by Prof. Martin Vetterli
Project: Quantization and Compression for Distributed Optimization, supervised by Dr. Sebastian Stich, MLO group led by Prof. Martin Jaggi
Thesis: Motion in 360: Models and Estimation, supervised by Dr. Francesca de Simone, LTS4 group led by Prof. Pascal Frossard

education.institution: Lycée français Jean Monnet de Bruxelles

volunteer.summary: Organizing various social events in my research group at KU Leuven, e.g., monthly dinners, gatherings.
One of the two class representatives of the Masters of Electrical Engineering (representing around 60 students).
Part of the administrative team of the largest student association of EPFL, planning and managing its budget.
Long term member of the student association of the Electrical Engineering department of EPFL, organizing various events for students.
Organizing social events for first year students, listening to them and advising them in both academic and social aspects.
